articles.description: SCIENTISTS have found the measles, mumps and rubella (MMR) vaccine could help protect people from severe Covid-19.

articles.title: Coronavirus: deaths rates double to highest in 20 years - BBC News - BBC News
articles.description: The heavy human cost of the Coronavirus pandemic is revealed in the latest official figures. They show that in the week ending 10th April death rates were do...
